scripts.pretest: npm --workspace @DarkAuth/admin-ui run build && npm --workspace @DarkAuth/user-ui run build
scripts.test: npm run pretest && npx playwright test --reporter=dot
scripts.test:screenshots: rm -rf test-results-light test-results-dark && npm run pretest && (COLOR_SCHEME=light npx playwright test --reporter=dot --workers=1 --output=test-results-light) || true && (COLOR_SCHEME=dark npx playwright test --reporter=dot --workers=1 --output=test-results-dark) || true && node ../brochureware/scripts/collect-screenshots.js
scripts.test:report: npm run pretest && npx playwright test && npx playwright show-report
